item.title: By: march12

item.description: Is it possible to have this solution presented in VB? I am using a dynamically created SqlDataSource and am having big problems returning the Primary Key, Identity Field.<br />
item.content:encoded: Is it possible to have this solution presented in VB? I am using a dynamically created SqlDataSource and am having big problems returning the Primary Key, Identity Field.
